title: Nothing I do will change anything in the universe. Why should I go on living? What's the point? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, Your Life is very special, you must take Good care of yourself. 450 Billion years of Growth of this planet resulted in you, here, now, today. And then there’s the fact that you are unique between some 7 Billion people on this planet… 2 great reasons to say WoW, and to understand that you are special ! (How good is that.) I cannot know who has taught you “things” that have led you to think the thoughts that you have at this point in your Life, but you coming here already means that you know that there’s “something wrong” with your mindset. And YES, it’s easy to change, to do better. Your Life was never meant to be about sickness, you were born healthy, and your Natural-you only wants to be healthy and Grow, all cells in your body re-generate new on a daily basis based on the foods and drinks that you take in. Growth is just your purpose in Life that happens “on automatic”. (But living peaceful-happy is the key, NOT in sickness or with other bad ‘things’, you don’t want/need Badness, because only GOODness will make you enjoy, and Grow. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Today is YOUR day, a peaceful-happy day where you can LEARN from GOOD experiences that will make you grow to become your BEST you, so you are optimized while you are connecting with other people near you. That’s the meaning of your Life, that’s all and there’s nothing more to it, no matter what other people may want you to believe/say or do. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - The feelings that you are having; the Problems, Stress or that feeling that you’re “just not in the right place” are signs > listen to your own inner self more: you got these illness-feelings that you’re having, well, your inner you is warning you that you need CHANGE. You need to make BiG changes, and then you’ll become your peaceful-happy self again, the one you were when you were a child, but then your today-you with a lot more experiences that you learnt from. Learn differently, you can “start new and re-freshed”; start to use SIMPLICITY in your life, because everything will become clearer to you. Easily, and pretty Fast too. I can’t possibly mention all factors that influence you every moment of every day, because your Life is too BiG. Some conscious and some subconscious ‘stuffs’ are good for you while others are not good. Things are unclear and troubled these days with too many influences from a.o. Media, Social stuff, Political and even Religious things. Everything is too much for you, and so you become dis-eased. Time for you to change your Mindset (your inner you) and your Perspective on Life (out there). Start by > recognizing the GOODness and ‘Bad stuffs’ around you, and then…. separate everything into 2 columns: Good on the left column and Bad on the right side. Whatever comes to you > place it in the Good or Bad column. The Badness you do NOT want, and the GOODness; you need more of that/those. That’s your start to avoid/block/eliminate/end/stop all the badness. More of the GOODness then can come to you. 2 NOTES: 1. Nature works slow to change and so do you, so give yourself a year or more to get to that moment in your Life where you have optimized all parts of your daily Life. Optimizing things for the rest of your Life is the way to go, but you’ll get there later-on. First-things-first; make your slow start. 2. YOU are responsible for your Life, not other people. So be in control and do everything by yourself. It’s all up to you, it’s your learning Life. Once you optimized your GOODness and you block all the badness you can enjoy today and you will be Strong, Confident and empowered ! Conclusion: Stop to copy the lives of others, but instead find out what ‘works’ for you how YOU feel good, (and how YOU can grow and help others to grow). Follow the 85-15-principle that you’ll find in my Quora Spaces page. (as of now, it’s still “under construction” by Quora [regretfully], but return here very soon, like after a few days, I hope, and then it will be available again.) Here is the right stuff for your mindset that you need: https://www.perspective-mindset.quora.com/ You’ll come to that point in your Life where you see “the point”, don’t worry. But that can be at 85-years-of-age as a grandparent who’s doing good for grandchild. Maybe you will have truthful understanding of your purpose then, until then: Experience - Learn - optimize your Life to become your BEST YOU. Grow your GOODness.

I know exactly how you feel. I think about that myself. Personally, I want to see what the future has in store ! Man has walked on the Moon. We have close-up pictures of every planet in our Solar System. We are still discovering the Wonders of the Ocean’s Deep. Will we live to see full disclosure on the UFO mystery? Will we see the President of the U.S. standing at the podium in the White House introducing Zytar, the Ambassador from Andromeda ? Will we be “driving” flying cars like George Jetson ? Will we see the cure for cancer discovered ? Maybe a more loving, peaceful World ? My friend, there are just sooo many mysteries waiting for us to find. Let’s not miss out !! Peace.
